question: Please check the symptoms you are currently experiencing:
options: History of travel within the last 2 weeks ?
History of contact or exposure to someone who travelled in areas with local transmission?
History of contact or exposure to a person with suspected/ probable positive case of covid 19 ?
Do you or anyone in your household have any of the above mentioned symptoms or pending COVID-19 test results?

question: If you have fever, since when?
